name: Unnamed Adventure/无名之旅
description:
Combat

Enjoy a pixel precise, skilled based combat system. Where you have to pay full attention to enemy's move, and choose best action accordingly. Unlock a variety of skills to improve your combat moves as well.
Include 38 unique enemy types, 15 boss/mini boss fights.


Puzzles and Platforming

As you progress through the game, you will discover new abilities to solve different small puzzles over the map, find new upgrade items, materials to craft new runes to help you conquer your enemies.

Story and Lore

An dark, rich story hidden behind items and conversation, discover it alone your journey!

Asset Credit

This project cannot be done without these people!
Sorry that I cannot provide links to your assets here, if needed, please refer to links in game after the ending, or my youtube channel inside the playthrough video.
